short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Mac Chrome shortcut for secondary work Google calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Problem:
Using multiple Google Calendars (personal and for work) and Chrome does not provide a way to create shortcuts for particular accounts. The shortcut always opens the most recently accessed calendar.

Solution:
Install this extension and follow instructions to create a shortcut for your personal or work Google calendars

How it works: creates a manifest in the Calendar page before saving as a Shortcut. Then saves that URL (eg, calendar.google.com/u/1/r) as the shortcut URL.

Source: https://github.com/karlhorky/dotfiles/blob/master/tricks/gsuite-google-calendar-chrome-desktop-app-shortcut.md.
